main event: A small bright light was observed in the sky for about 10 minutes near Lexington, Kentucky on January 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was initially observed for 10 minutes before fading out., Multiple witnesses, including friends of the primary observer, reported seeing the object., Descriptions included several small white flashing lights on the object., The sighting duration was extended to 20 minutes for some observers before the object went behind trees., Observations indicated the object maintained a consistent height and direction until it disappeared.
sighted object: a small bright light with several white flashing lights
witness description: friends and a registered nurse along with other passersby
